# resourcepool

Create a resource pool

## Usage

```console
coder resourcepool [flags] create
```

## Description

```console
Create a resource pool by sending configuration to the API endpoint.
```

## Options

### -n, --name

|      |                     |
| ---- | ------------------- |
| Type | <code>string</code> |

Name of the resourcepool.

### -f, --template-dir

|      |                     |
| ---- | ------------------- |
| Type | <code>string</code> |

Path to the resource pool template dir.

### -c, --capacity

|      |                  |
| ---- | ---------------- |
| Type | <code>int</code> |

Capacity of the resource pool (integer).
